name: isRecurring
label: Payment is recurring
description: Indicates whether the payment product that is used for this payment should support recurring payments. If set to true, products not supporting recurring will be filtered.

name: isInstallments
label: Payment is in installments
description: Use this property to indicate whether the payment will be paid in instalments. This will be taken into account when determining the availability of credit cards when making an IIN details call.

name: groupPaymentProducts
label: Group payment products
description: Enabling this setting will bundle all Credit Card payment products to a single list item (Payment Product Group). The IIN Details service call can be used to determine what card product is actually used by the consumer.

fields.name: merchantId
fields.label: Merchant ID
fields.description: Your Worldline merchant ID. You can find this ID in the Configuration Center.

fields.name: merchantName
fields.label: Merchant Name
fields.description: The name of your business that will be shown to consumers in the Payment Sheet, and in Google Pay payment overviews.

fields.name: merchantName
fields.label: Merchant Name
fields.description: This is used as an input for the Apple Pay payment button. You can provide your company name in a human-readable form.
